yuddhaye awasan adiyara thula siduwu minis jiwitha ahimiwim sandaha hethuwu karana ha siduwim pilibandawa, adala siduwim sandaha kisiyam pudgalayeku ho pudgalayan kandayamak wisheshayen wagakima dariya yuthuda yana waga jathyanthara manawa himikam nithi muladharma wishayehi anukulawa katayuthu karannata parshawa dekama – enam rajaye hamuda saha demala wimukthi koti sanwidhanaya kotharam durata katayuthu kaleda yana waga saha demala wimukthi koti sanwidhanaya wisin siwil wasiyan minis palihak washayen bhawithayata ganima saha owun wisin sidu kara athi wenath aparadha ki්raya yanadiya pilibandawada wibhaga kala haki paridden ihatha komishame wishaya pathaya pulul karanne yayi janadhipathiwaraya niwedanaya kara atha.

(kolambaa, lankapuwath) – diwi naguma departhamenthuwe mudalin lith laksha 50k mudranaya kirima sambandhayen nithi wirodhi ha saparadhi mudal pariharanaya yatathe hitapu amathya basil rajapaksha mahathata saha diwi naguma departhamenthuwe hitapu adhyaksha janaral kithsiri ranawakata wiruddhawa gonu kara athi naduwa ada(15) yali kadawanu labiya.
